title: Inspired by 'Kashmir Files', Hindutva Workers Threaten to Remove Muslims From Roorkee Village - The Wire
content: Inspired by 'Kashmir Files', Hindutva Workers Threaten to Remove Muslims From Roorkee Village  The Wire
description: In the aftermath of a Hanuman Jayanti procession which saw stone pelting on April 16, most Muslims have had to leave the Bhagwanpur area. Those who stayed behind say they are in constant fear.
